attributes.action: Remove Speed Limits On Certain Motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK Should Adopt The German Way Of Motoring; Motorways Such As The M25, M1, M4 Etc Should Have NO Speed Limits In The Exception Of Poor Driving Conditions. The Motorways Need To Built Exactly Like The Autobahn; The Roads In Germany Are Smooth, The overall safety record of autobahns is generally better than other European motorways, despite the high traffic density, comparably low.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
